message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a rare opportunity to get it at a great price. I'm willing to let it go for $15000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're interested in the product, but $10000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $13500. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $11000?

I can see you're really interested in the product, but $11000 is still a bit short for me. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll offer it to you for $12500. This is my final offer, so if you're interested, now is the time to make a decision.
I understand this is your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $12250. Can you consider this?
